title: Podcast Episode 52.2 – RIDE A RANCHER by Elle Christiansen
description:
Our audiobook this week is RIDE A RANCHER by bestselling author Elle Christiansen!  

Narrated by Kit Swan and Matthew Maddux

Sometimes the perfect person for you is the one you least expect it to be.

Stone Kensington is no stranger to hard work, and he knows what it takes to make a ranch a success. Determination and grit—something he figures a city girl like Helena Robinson will never have.

Helena left all the shallow and fake people in her life behind to start fresh. She’s not a softie playing rancher as Stone assumes, and it doesn’t take long for her to prove it to him…and so much more.

Stone quickly realizes Helena is not what he thought, and she belongs to him. The only problem is Helena doesn’t believe love and marriage are for her, even though she wants to be with Stone. He’ll have to convince her that he’s for real and what they have will last.

PRE-ORDER eBook (bonus epilogue) https://amzn.to/2MViQYM

FOR RANCHERS ONLY by Elle Christiansen (on KU!): https://amzn.to/2NdBsC7

THE RANCHERS ROSE by Elle Christiansen (on KU!): https://amzn.to/2W95KKA

Podcast Production by Lola
